meta_description: The FASNY Museum of Firefighting; an interactive and fun educational attraction, part of the rich history and culture of Hudson, NY in beautiful Columbia County.
admission_text:
Visit Hudson[Jamie Quinn](http://web.archive.org/web/20231027123950/https://fasnyfiremuseum.com/author/jamie/ "Posts by Jamie Quinn")2020-03-04T15:36:36-05:00

# Hudson, New York: Rich with history, culture and scenic beauty; the Museum’s home since 1925

The FASNY Museum of Firefighting is proud to be one of the many attractions and cultural experiences available in the city of Hudson, New York. Located in the rolling riverside hills of Columbia County, Hudson blends a rich history dating to Dutch colonial times with all the cultural features of a thriving, vibrant small city. Charming B&Bs, quaint and quirky shops, a bumper crop of antiques, great restaurants — Hudson has it all. Combined with the wealth of natural beauty and recreational opportunities of Columbia County and the Hudson Valley region, the city of Hudson is the perfect destination for a weekend getaway or a fun family adventure. Check out the link below to learn more.

[](http://web.archive.org/web/20231027123950/https://columbiacountytourism.org/)
